name: Matic Token from Ethereum
description: Bridged from Ethereum via https://bridge.pulsechain.com. Original Address - 0x7D1AfA7B718fb893dB30A3aBc0Cfc608AaCfeBB0. Matic Network is a Layer-2 scaling solution that uses sidechains for off-chain computation while ensuring asset security using the Plasma framework and a decentralized network of Proof-of-Stake (PoS) validators.
